articles.content:
The S&P/ASX 200 Index (ASX: XJO) fell by 0.8% to 6,714 points.
Here are some of the highlights from the ASX today:
Afterpay Ltd (ASX: APT) and Zip Co Ltd (ASX: Z1P)have opposite performances
